mapper.select:
SELECT a.CBAA01, a.CBAA07,a.CBAA08,b.CBWA09,b.CBWA10,d.CALA08,a.CBAA18,a.CBAA19,a.CBAA11
from CBAA a LEFT JOIN CBWA b ON a.CBAA09=b.CBWA01 LEFT JOIN CBWA c on a.CBAA10=c.CBWA01 LEFT JOIN CALA d on d.CALA01=a.CBAA16 where a.CBAA06=0

SELECT a.CBAA01, a.CBAA07,a.CBAA08,b.CBWA09,c.CBWA10,d.CALA08,a.CBAA18,a.CBAA19,a.CBAA11,a.CBAA08
from CBAA a LEFT JOIN CBWA b ON a.CBAA09=b.CBWA01 LEFT JOIN CBWA c on a.CBAA10=c.CBWA01 LEFT JOIN CALA d on d.CALA01=a.CBAA16 where a.CBAA06=0 and b.CBWA09 like concat('%', #{cbwa09}, '%') and CBAA02 like concat('%', #{cbaa02}, '%') and CBAA03 like concat('%', #{cbaa03}, '%') and CBAA04 like concat('%', #{cbaa04}, '%') and CBAA05 like concat('%', #{cbaa05}, '%') and CBAA06 like concat('%', #{cbaa06}, '%') and CBAA07 like concat('%', #{cbaa07}, '%') and CBAA08 like concat('%', #{cbaa08}, '%') and CBAA09 like concat('%', #{cbaa09}, '%') and CBAA10 like concat('%', #{cbaa10}, '%') and CBAA11 like concat('%', #{cbaa11}, '%') and CBAA12 like concat('%', #{cbaa12}, '%') and CBAA13 like concat('%', #{cbaa13}, '%') and CBAA14 like concat('%', #{cbaa14}, '%') and CBAA15 like concat('%', #{cbaa15}, '%') and CBAA16 like concat('%', #{cbaa16}, '%') and CBAA17 like concat('%', #{cbaa17}, '%') and CBAA18 like concat('%', #{cbaa18}, '%') and CBAA19 like concat('%', #{cbaa19}, '%') and user_id like concat('%', #{userId}, '%')
and date_format(a.CBAA08,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.CBAA08,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
order by a.CBAA08 desc
select b.CBAC14 from CBAA a left JOIN CBAC b ON a.CBAA01=b.CBAA01 WHERE a.CBAA01=#{cbaa01} GROUP BY b.CBAC14
